net.explorviz.settings.services

Class SettingsRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.settings.services.SettingsRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MongoRepository<net.explorviz.settings.model.Setting,java.lang.String>

    @Service
public class SettingsRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements MongoRepository<net.explorviz.settings.model.Setting,java.lang.String>
    This service is responsible for persisting and retrieving Setting objects. It is backed by mongodb.
